title: Tender for the Supply of the Retuximab Injection  500ml in 50ml 900 vials
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of Health to award the above tender to the only responsive bidder, on the recommendation of the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee, for a total cost of US $1,166,400.00 (LKR 133,319,520.00), was approved by the Cabinet.
